Solar_Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar_Panel.description: Flexible thin-film solar panel with high-efficiency photovoltaic cells and lightweight materials

embodiment.description: Flexible thin-film solar panel with high-efficiency and design

physics_models.name: Solar Irradiance Model
physics_models.python_code:
from sympy import symbols, Eq, solve
P, eta, A, G = symbols('P eta A G')
Eq(P, eta * A * G)
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant efficiency; Constant area; Constant irradiance

Water_Pump.name: Water Pump
Water_Pump.description: Compact DC pump with advanced motor technology and lightweight design

embodiment.description: Compact water pump with advanced design

physics_models.name: Pump Performance Model
physics_models.python_code:
from sympy import symbols, Eq, solve
Q, eta, P, delta_p = symbols('Q eta P delta_p')
Eq(Q, eta * P * delta_p)
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant efficiency; Constant power; Constant pressure difference

Filter_Module.name: Filter Module
Filter_Module.description: Compact ceramic filter with high-efficiency removal of bacteria, viruses, and micro-plastics

embodiment.description: Compact filter module with advanced design

physics_models.name: Filtration Performance Model
physics_models.python_code:
from sympy import symbols, Eq, solve
C_out, C_in, eta = symbols('C_out C_in eta')
Eq(C_out, C_in * (1 - eta))
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant removal efficiency; Constant input concentration

Control_Unit.name: Control Unit
Control_Unit.description: Compact microcontroller with high-performance processing and data analytics and lightweight design

embodiment.description: Compact control unit with advanced design

physics_models.name: Control Unit Performance Model
physics_models.python_code:
from sympy import symbols, Eq, solve
T, eta, P, delta_t = symbols('T eta P delta_t')
Eq(T, eta * P * delta_t)
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant efficiency; Constant power; Constant time step
